description:
The first night begins with the victory of the Americans against the Chinese. The Japanese school decides to do a training camp to enhance their power. But Shizuka is ordered to turn over her Origin, and if she agrees she won`t be able to participate in the next battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Compagnes de voyage et pièges fantaisistes
Companions on a Journey, and Whimsical Traps
Tabi wa Michizure Wana wa Kimagure
旅は道連れ罠は気まぐれ
